cards.name: Armouron
cards.description: Armouron is a legendary Pokémon that can be found in the deepest and darkest of caverns. Covered in ornate armour from head to toe, this powerful being is as indestructible as steel. With its mysterious ability of Magnet Bomb, Armouron can utilize the magnetic fields of the caves it inhabits to its advantage to surprise and overwhelm opponents. During its down time, Armouron relaxes by polishing its armour to keep it shining and sharp.
cards.image_prompt: Armouron::0 a legendary metal-type pokemon::2.5, wearing ornate armor, in a cave environment, natural and brown ambient lighting, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
